title: CheckMyLink
description: Everything you are, in one simple link. A link-in-bio platform that lets you share your content, social profiles, and important information through a single, customizable link — with AI-powered themes, detailed analytics, and QR code sharing.

title: Superfect
description: Autonomous QA that remembers your application. Superfect explores your app, builds a persistent state graph, and detects regressions across every release — no scripts, no maintenance, just coverage.
